<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/ledgers/{sequence}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The single ledger endpoint provides information on a specific ledger.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"sequence","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The sequence number of a specific ledger.","schema":{"type":"integer","example":0}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
